data.inclusions:
Your FORMULA 1 ETIHAD AIRWAYS ABU DHABI GRAND PRIX ticket puts you right at the heart of the action, from the best view of the track to the entertainment FanZones.  

As well as other exclusive offers, all tickets also include entry to: 

Pit-Lane Walk on Thursday
Yasalam After-Race Concerts at Etihad Park 
Warner Bros World Abu Dhabi™, Yas Waterworld, Ferrari World Abu Dhabi, or SeaWorld Abu Dhabi (one theme park only) 
Louvre Abu Dhabi 
Qasr Al Watan

data.inclusions:
The Lounge is unrivalled fun at the cricket in a relaxed environment. Enjoy
the day with friends or clients with grazing menu, food stations, beverage
package, indoor unreserved bar tables, as well as outdoor seating.

All day grazing menu with a range of canapés and light dishes
Beverage package including beer, wine, soft drinks, coffee and tea
Dedicated in bowl seating area which ensures you’ve got an excellent view of the action
Feature food station offering more substantial dishes over main innings break
Dedicated reception host offering all day concierge service
Enjoy your day in air-conditioned comfort
Smart Casual Dress Code

data.inclusions:
Guests will enjoy great food, a friendly service, whilst savoring the famous pre-match
atmosphere. Exclusive post match access is also given to guests after the game.
Access to venue (off-stadium) 3 hours prior to kick-off
Complimentary matchday programme
Reception drink
Buffet service commences on arrival into the lounge
Match ticket in the wing section of the Upper Sir Kenny Dalglish Stand but can vary for cup
games
Return to The Village after the final whistle for post-match refreshments
Dress code smart casual, team shirts allowed.

data.inclusions:
Brodies Lounge is a vibrant and sociable space with complementary classic street food,
half-time refreshments, plus an appearance from a former LFC legend on matchdays
Dedicated access from Brodies Sports Bar to your seats
Access to lounge 2.5 hrs prior to kick off
A varied selection of complimentary street food (served up to kick-off)
Licensed cash bar
Complimentary half-time drink (beer, wine or soft drink)
Complimentary Match Programme
A Liverpool FC legend in attendance at every match day
Pre-Match Entertainment
In-lounge betting facilities
Dress code smart casual, team shirts allowed.

data.inclusions:
Package to include:

A 30-person, pitch-facing suite, with 18 balcony seats
The best view from your private balcony seating area, located directly outside your suite
Complimentary bar of beer, wine & soft drinks
Food is available on the Lord’s concourse to purchase
Dedicated hospitality entrance for fast-tracked entry
Visits from cricket legends
TV with satellite and match coverage

data.event_name: India Tour Of England, 2025 - Lords Test
data.inclusions:
•⁠  ⁠Officially allocated premium Lower Mound Stand seats
•⁠  ⁠Private tables available
•⁠  ⁠Dedicated hospitality entrance for fast-tracked entry
•⁠  ⁠Visits from greats of the game
•⁠  ⁠Luxury breakfast menu
•⁠  ⁠À la carte three-course lunch menu
•⁠  ⁠Traditional Lord’s Afternoon Tea, with hand-crafted savoury and sweet treats
•⁠  ⁠Complimentary bar, including Champagne, fine wines, beers, spirits and soft drinks
•⁠  ⁠Experience hosting staff to ensure the smooth running of your day

data.event_name: India Tour Of England, 2025 - Lords Test
data.inclusions:
Located on the balcony level of the new Compton Stand – an area reserved for premium seating guests – this area offers some of the best and most comfortable views in the Ground. Those who book also benefit from access to the pitch facing, members bar located directly behind your seat, The Old Clock Tower Bar.

An official ticket for your chosen day of the Test Match.
Access to the exclusive Old Clock Tower Bar
Dedicated hospitality entrance for fast-tracked entry
